title: Traffic Bootstrap Campaign - Analytics & Tracking Setup
description:
Verify and configure analytics tracking on all campaign properties before launching paid ads.

## Properties
- cats.center
- dnsscience.io
- veribits.com

## Required Tracking
1. **Analytics Platform** - Google Analytics or analytics.afterdarksys.com
2. **Facebook Pixel** - For cats.center retargeting
3. **LinkedIn Insight Tag** - For B2B properties
4. **Conversion Events** - Signup, trial start, etc.
5. **UTM Parameters** - Proper attribution

## UTM Structure
```
?utm_source=[platform]&utm_medium=[paid|organic]&utm_campaign=[campaign_name]
```

This is a BLOCKER for paid ad tickets.
acceptance_criteria: LinkedIn Insight Tag verified on B2B sites
testing_plan:
1. Visit each site, verify analytics event in real-time
2. Test signup flow, verify conversion event
3. Test UTM parameter persistence through signup
4. Verify Facebook Pixel Helper shows active pixel
